name: esmp-feature-switcher
description: Chrome extension for managing ESMP feature flags

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:static
scripts.copy:static: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy:static && esbuild src/popup/popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup/popup.js --target=chrome100 --watch
